```{r prep_libs_05, eval=FALSE}
# data libraries
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
library(glue)
library(tidyr)

# plotting
library(ggplot2)
library(patchwork)
library(scico)
```

```{r read_fl_data, eval=FALSE}
infomover::print_fitness_landscape("data")
data = read_csv("data/info/data_fitness_landscape.csv")
```

```{r prep_plot, eval=FALSE}
ggplot(data, 
       aes(a,b))+
  geom_tile(aes(fill = energy),
             shape = 21)+
  geom_tile(data = tibble(a = 0, b = 0),
            col = "dodgerblue",
            fill = NA,
            width = 0.5,
            height = 0.5,
            size = 0.2)+
  scale_fill_scico(palette = "broc")+
  coord_fixed(expand = FALSE)+
  theme_test()+
  facet_grid(filename~flr)
```
